description: Contract with minor - voidable at minor's option
facts: Minor seeks to return motorcycle and get refund
asp_facts: contract(c1). parties(c1, dealer, minor). subject_matter(c1, motorcycle). party_minor(c1, buyer). party_age(c1, 16). necessity(c1, no). disaffirmance(c1, yes). reasonable_time(c1, yes). ratification(c1, no). full_performance(c1, yes).
question: Can the minor disaffirm the contract?
rationale: Contracts with minors are voidable at the minor's option. Since the motorcycle is not a necessity, the minor may disaffirm the contract and obtain a refund. The minor has chosen to exercise this right within a reasonable time.
